How to Buy Bitcoin with Low Fees

Most bitcoin exchanges and dealers let you buy bitcoin with low fees as there is strong competition. The list below contains companies that let you buy or trade bitcoin with a fee of 1% or less. 1% has become somewhat of a standard across bitcoin brokers. Exchanges are somewhat more competitive and often have fees at under 0.5% per trade.

Coinbase Buy Bitcoin

The world's largest Bitcoin broker. Buy bitcoin with your bank account. Easy, fast, convenient.
